blocks.subject: EA EVENT MASTER SCHEDULE
text: Per our conversation last Friday please prepare a CA for the two projects ECS is working on with Rusk County Electric ( RCE). As requested, the following is the info for both projects:
Facility Name: Oakhill Pipeline's Hinkle Compressor Station
Project Description: Add 7,000 Hp to OHP's existing station.
Legal Entity Name: Anadarko Energy Services Company
Project Description: Add/ replace 12,000 to 15,000 Hp to Anadarko's Carthage facility.

As a recap to our conversation on Friday we want to make sure the deatails of our request for service will be held private for at least six months and preferably longer.  Give me a call at 3-4503 if you have any questions.
